title: Integrative Medicine
description: Integrative medicine, popular for health and wellness, brings together conventional and alternative healthcare, including acupuncture and massage therapy.
cleaned_text: incorporates alternative health care services such as acupuncture, massage therapy and Tai Chi. Many primary care providers, and some hospitals, offer different types of integrative medicine services or can refer you to alternative therapy providers. Integrative medicine includes alternative therapies such as: - Massage therapy - Nutritional counseling and dietary supplements - Acupuncture - Mindfulness and relaxation techniques - Osteopathic manipulation
